com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server
Class AbstractServiceBase

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server.AbstractServiceBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceDirectoryService
public abstract class AbstractServiceBase
extends java.lang.Object

Base class of all service implementations that can be managed by the publishing engine.

Constructor Detail

AbstractServiceBase

protected AbstractServiceBase(ServiceType serviceType,
                              java.lang.Object publishedObject,
                              java.lang.String publishedName)
Base class constructor called by the publishing engine.
The derived service implementation subclass is expected to have a constructor with the same signature except "publishedObject" should be of the concrete type required by the implementation.

Parameters:
serviceType - The service type configuration
publishedObject - The object to be published by this service implementation instance
publishedName - The name of the service instance. This should be used as e.g the EndPoint name

sendClientRequestWithReturnValue

protected java.util.Map<INotificationSession,java.lang.Object> sendClientRequestWithReturnValue(java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                                                int timeout,
                                                                                                java.lang.Object... parameters)
Fires a notification to the clients and collects their return values.

Parameters:
methodName - name of the notification method
timeout - timeout for waiting for all clients to send their responses
parameters - parameters for the notification method
Returns:
a Map of client sessions with their corresponding return values
